paper_abstract: In this paper we show how network structure and traffic may be modeled and simulated using the Concurrent Object-Oriented Petri Nets formalism with system risk analysis in mind. A small example of network is given, along with its model, which is then extended and simulated. We also show the different directions we plan to take in order to make the models even more realistic and to be able to verify them.
paper_title: Network structure and traffic modeling and simulation with CO-OPN
